data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio do Maritimo have now been confirmed.
The match is underway. Belenenses have kicked-off.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Maritimo.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Belenenses throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Belenenses have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 2, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Belenenses are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 3, In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Belenenses advance rapidly upfield but Fabio Verissimo blows for offside.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Belenenses.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, Miguel Cardoso gets his shot on target but fails to score for Belenenses.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Belenenses close to the penalty box.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Silvestre Varela for Belenenses gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Can Maritimo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Belenenses's half?
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Fabio Verissimo signals a throw-in for Belenenses, close to Maritimo's area.
In the minute 19, Belenenses are coming forward and Bruno Ramires gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Maritimo throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In the minute 22, Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
At Estadio do Maritimo, Rodrigo Pinho has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 24, Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Belenenses.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 26, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Attention is being given to Belenensesâ€™s Tiago Esgaio and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 28, Free kick Maritimo.
It seems as if Tiago Esgaio is unable to continue. Diogo Calila replaces him for the away team.
Throw-in Belenenses.
Belenenses needs to be cautious. Maritimo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 31, Maritimo to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Maritimo pushes forward through Pedro Pelagio, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 34, Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Belenenses.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Maritimo just outside Belenenses's area.
In the minute 38, Afonso Sousa (Belenenses) has received a yellow card from Fabio Verissimo.
Zainadine Junior (Maritimo) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Belenenses defenders.
Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
In the minute 40, Throw-in high up the field for Maritimo in Funchal.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Belenenses.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Maritimo throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In the minute 43, Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Belenenses.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Funchal.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Maritimo with the kick-off.
Fabio Verissimo awards Belenenses a goal kick.
Belenenses's Stanislav Kritsyuk has been booked in Funchal.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 47, Tomas Ribeiro for Belenenses has been booked by Fabio Verissimo and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 48, Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Maritimo throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
In the minute 49, Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Belenenses in Funchal.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Maritimo.
Franck Bambock is booked for the home team.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Funchal.
Jorge Correa is replacing Pedro Pelagio for the home team.
In the minute 59, Belenenses to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Stanislav Kritsyuk in Belenenses has been yellow-carded a second time by Fabio Verissimo and is being sent off.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Belenenses make their second substitution with Guilherme replacing Silvestre Varela.
In the minute 64, In Funchal, Marcelo Hermes of Maritimo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Maritimo's Marcelo Hermes misses with an attempt on goal.
Belenenses have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Claudio Winck of Maritimo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio do Maritimo.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Maritimo close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 67, Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joel is replacing Ali Alipour for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
The home team replace Rafik Guitane with Edgar Costa.
In the minute 69, Maritimo are caught offside.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 71, Maritimo have a dangerous throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Phete.
Phete is back on the pitch.
In the minute 73, In Funchal Maritimo's Rodrigo Pinho is caught offside.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Miguel Cardoso's header is off-target for Belenenses.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 76, Bruno Ramires (Belenenses) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Maritimo throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 79, Francois Xavier Fumu Tamuzo is on a sub for Claudio Winck for Maritimo.
Marcelinho is on a sub for Franck Bambock for Maritimo.
In the minute 81, In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Maritimo.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Belenenses.
In Funchal Belenenses drive forward through Miguel Cardoso. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Fabio Verissimo awards Belenenses a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Afonso Sousa is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Afonso Sousa, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Richard Rodrigues is the substitute for Belenenses.
The away team replace Miguel Cardoso with Afonso Taira.
In the minute 86, Petit (Belenenses) is making a fifth substitution, with Mateo Cassierra replacing Sphephelo Sithole.
Throw-in Maritimo.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
In the minute 89, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Free kick Belenenses.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Maritimo in the half of Belenenses.
Fabio Verissimo signals a throw-in for Maritimo, close to Belenenses's area.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Belenenses throw-in in Maritimo's half.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Maritimo have got their heads in front thanks to a Joel strike.
That's a fine assist from Marcelo Hermes.
Ruben Lima for Belenenses has been booked by Fabio Verissimo and receives a first yellow card.
Francois Xavier Fumu Tamuzo (Maritimo) has received a first yellow card.
Phete (Belenenses) has been shown a straight red card by referee Fabio Verissimo.
